Entries.George: It's bloody cold, isn't it? What a rotten day.
Entries.Sam: Rain muffles sound, so I can play my guitar louder without my mum getting mad. Hehe.$h
Entries.Elliott: Sometimes when I lie in bed I can hear a distant foghorn cut through the rain.#$b#But when I look out the window I see only a curtain of grey.
Entries.Dwarf: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us dwarfs live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
